meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasant or agreeable.
meanings.sent1: Her niceness always brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your niceness towards others.
meanings.sent3: His niceness was so contagious that even grumpy people smiled.
meanings.sent4: The niceness of the weather made the picnic unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The niceness of her voice was like a soothing melody.

meanings.definition: The act of being kind or considerate.
meanings.sent1: Showing niceness to animals is important.
meanings.sent2: Her niceness towards strangers was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: His niceness extended to helping lost kittens find their way home.
meanings.sent4: The niceness of her gesture brought tears to my eyes.
meanings.sent5: The niceness of his words made the situation better instantly.

meanings.definition: The state of being enjoyable or pleasing.
meanings.sent1: The niceness of the movie made me smile throughout.
meanings.sent2: The niceness of the park attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The niceness of the surprise party left her speechless.
meanings.sent4: The niceness of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The niceness of the aroma filled the kitchen with warmth.
